Class ApplicationController

java.lang.Object
controller.ApplicationController
public class ApplicationController extends Object
Controller for managing BTO applications and flat bookings.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ApplicationController(ApplicationDB applicationDB, ProjectDB projectDB, UserDB userDB)
    Constructs a new ApplicationController with references to all necessary databases.

    • ApplicationController

      public ApplicationController(ApplicationDB applicationDB, ProjectDB projectDB, UserDB userDB)
      Constructs a new ApplicationController with references to all necessary databases.
      Parameters:
      applicationDB - The application database
      projectDB - The project database
      userDB - The user database

  • Method Details

    • createApplication

      public String createApplication(String applicantNric, String projectName, FlatType flatType)
      Creates a new application for a project.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant
      projectName - The name of the project
      flatType - The flat type applied for
      Returns:
      The application ID if successful, null otherwise

    • getApplication

      public Application getApplication(String applicationId)
      Gets an application by ID.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application
      Returns:
      The application, or null if not found

    • getCurrentApplication

      public Application getCurrentApplication(String applicantNric)
      Gets the current application for an applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      The application, or null if none found

    • getApplicationsByProject

      public List<Application> getApplicationsByProject(String projectName)
      Gets all applications for a project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      A list of applications for the project

    • getApplicationsByProjectAndStatus

      public List<Application> getApplicationsByProjectAndStatus(String projectName, ApplicationStatus status)
      Gets all applications with a specific status for a project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      status - The status to filter by
      Returns:
      A list of applications with the specified status

    • approveApplication

      public boolean approveApplication(String applicationId)
      Approves an application.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to approve
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • rejectApplication

      public boolean rejectApplication(String applicationId)
      Rejects an application.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to reject
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • bookFlat

      public String bookFlat(String applicationId, String officerNric)
      Books a flat for a successful application.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application
      officerNric - The NRIC of the officer processing the booking
      Returns:
      The booking ID if successful, null otherwise

    • getBookingsByProject

      public List<FlatBooking> getBookingsByProject(String projectName)
      Gets all bookings for a project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      A list of bookings for the project

    • requestWithdrawal

      public boolean requestWithdrawal(String applicationId)
      Requests withdrawal of an application.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • approveWithdrawal

      public boolean approveWithdrawal(String applicationId)
      Approves withdrawal of an application.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • generateReceipt

      public String generateReceipt(String bookingId)
      Generates a receipt for a flat booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The ID of the booking
      Returns:
      A string containing the receipt, or null if booking not found

    • generateBookingReport

      public List<FlatBooking> generateBookingReport(String projectName, FlatType flatType, MaritalStatus maritalStatus, Integer minAge, Integer maxAge)
      Generates a report of bookings filtered by various criteria.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project (optional)
      flatType - The type of flat (optional)
      maritalStatus - The marital status to filter by (optional)
      minAge - The minimum age to filter by (optional)
      maxAge - The maximum age to filter by (optional)
      Returns:
      A list of bookings matching the criteria
